About Steak n Shake Steak n Shake is a Fast Food restaurant located at 7510 Shawnee Mission Pky in Overland Park, KS . Steak n Shake has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 6 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, American, Burgers Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for Steak n Shake
All Reviews for Steak n Shake
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
6
Decor
6
Service
6
I just ate here yesterday (01/21/08) and ordered the dbl cheese burger. I split a small order of fry's with my co-worker. Every thing was good, I enjoyed the all you can drink fountain soda. But, This place cannot hold a candle against the 'Squeeze Inn' in Sacramento. The small fry's at the Squeeze Inn were twice as large. But, that's not saying we did not have enough fry's at the 88.
